org.springframework.web.client.reactive

接口 ClientRequest.BodyBuilder

  • 所有超级接口:
    ClientRequest.HeadersBuilder<ClientRequest.BodyBuilder>
    封闭接口:
    ClientRequest<T>

    public static interface ClientRequest.BodyBuilder
extends ClientRequest.HeadersBuilder<ClientRequest.BodyBuilder>
    Defines a builder that adds a body to the request entity.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T> ClientRequest<T> body(BodyInserter<T,? super ClientHttpRequest> inserter)
      Set the body of the request to the given BodyInserter and return it.
      <T,S extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>>
      ClientRequest<S>      		 body(S publisher, Class<T> elementClass)
      Set the body of the request to the given Publisher and return it.
      ClientRequest.BodyBuilder contentLength(long contentLength)
      Set the length of the body in bytes, as specified by the Content-Length header.
      ClientRequest.BodyBuilder contentType(MediaType contentType)
      Set the media type of the body, as specified by the Content-Type header.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.web.client.reactive.ClientRequest.HeadersBuilder

        accept, acceptCharset, build, cookie, cookies, header, headers, ifModifiedSince, ifNoneMatch

    • 方法详细资料

      • contentLength

        ClientRequest.BodyBuilder contentLength(long contentLength)
        Set the length of the body in bytes, as specified by the Content-Length header.
        参数:
        contentLength - the content length
        返回:
        this builder
        另请参阅:
        HttpHeaders.setContentLength(long)

      • contentType

        ClientRequest.BodyBuilder contentType(MediaType contentType)
        Set the media type of the body, as specified by the Content-Type header.
        参数:
        contentType - the content type
        返回:
        this builder
        另请参阅:
        HttpHeaders.setContentType(MediaType)

      • body

        <T> ClientRequest<T> body(BodyInserter<T,? super ClientHttpRequest> inserter)
        Set the body of the request to the given BodyInserter and return it.
        类型参数:
        T - the type contained in the body
        参数:
        inserter - the BodyInserter that writes to the request
        返回:
        the built request

      • body

        <T,S extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>> ClientRequest<S> body(S publisher,
                                                                     Class<T> elementClass)
        Set the body of the request to the given Publisher and return it.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the elements contained in the publisher
        S - the type of the Publisher
        参数:
        publisher - the Publisher to write to the request
        elementClass - the class of elements contained in the publisher
        返回:
        the built request
